item.title: Melissa add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "There are two kinds of teachers: the kind that fill you with so much quail shot that you can't move, and the kind that just gives you a little prod behind and you jump to the skies." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Melissa add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Cut out all these exclamation points. An exclamation point is like laughing at your own joke." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "My colleague told me: "It took a long time, but I finally figured it out. When it comes to men who are romantically interested in you, it's really simple. Just ignore everything they say and only pay attention to what they do." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "You may not want to hear it, but your critics are often the ones telling you they still love you and care about you, and want to make you better. " -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Fundamentals, fundamentals, fundamentals. You’ve got to get the fundamentals down because otherwise the fancy stuff isn’t going to work." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Give yourself permission to dream. Fuel your kids' dreams too. Once in a while, that might even mean letting them stay up past their bedtimes." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "When you're screwing up and nobody says anything to you anymore, that means they've given up on you." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Melissa add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin
